title: Moura
body: Antonio de Moura Rolim, as Dr. Álvaro de Azevedo says on page 527 of Saudades, is mentioned in the list of benefactors of the Funchal Misericórdia, immediately after the establishment of this, and it is also read in the same work, on page 851, that João de Moura Rolim founded the chapel of the Lord in the original church of Santa Maria Maior, and there he had his tomb with this epitaph: Tomb of João de Moura Rolim Founder of this chapel of the SS. mo –727.

João de Moura Rolim: Founder of the chapel of the Lord in the original church of Santa Maria Maior
